i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.

participant_2.background:
I am a successful novelist, but my mother is still worried about my horror novels.
I'm a food blogger who loves to share my favorite restaurant finds with my readers.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.
I have a mobile that plays music and lights up to help my baby sleep.
I have a big, black truck that I love taking to the mountains on the weekends.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing great! Just got home from a long day at work.
Oh, I know that feeling. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a food blogger, so I'm always on the go trying new restaurants and taking pictures of my food.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm always looking for new places to eat.
It is! And it's great to be able to share my love of food with others.
What's your favorite type of food?
I love all kinds of food, but I'm especially a fan of Italian food.
Me too! I love pasta and pizza.
Same here! I love making pasta at home.
That's great! I'm not very good at cooking, but I love trying new recipes.
Well, if you're ever in the mood for some Italian food, I'm happy to share my recipes with you!
